title: React Cheatsheet
description: Overview of React, components, and core hooks with short examples.

content.text: React is a library for building user interfaces using components and declarative rendering.
Use function components and Hooks for modern React development.
Add local state to function components using useState.
Run side effects after render with useEffect. Provide dependencies to control when it runs.
Extract reusable logic into custom hooks whose names start with 'use'.
